message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $120. I believe it's a fair price considering its value.
I appreciate your time, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I'm willing to make a reasonable offer, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I'm looking for something closer to $110. It's a high-quality product, and I'm confident it's worth that price.
I understand that the product is high-quality, but I still think $90 is a fair price. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, so I'll offer $97.50. Can you consider that?
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  How about we split the difference between our last offers and settle at $103.75? That's my final offer.
I'm still a bit above my budget, but I'm willing to meet you at $100. That's the highest I can go. Can you accept that?
